creator: Retzsch, Moritz, 1779-1857
title: Faust; esquisses dessinées
description: Etched t.p.; title within ornamental border.
Contains 26 numbered etches plates before letters; lithographs of plates 1-21, 23-26 after letters; proof of border of t.p.; 15 plates without numbers or letters.

BEIN Speck Ck99 R3 +830b Copy 2:  Another copy containing only the 26 numbered etched plates before letters, as in the above. 24 x 31 cm. (Text 21 x 28 cm.). In portfolio with original paper covers. "Auf dem Umschlag eine Originallithographie, nicht nach Retzsch, lith. von Bachebois ainé à St. Denis"--Kippenberg, no. 1884.

BEIN Speck Ck99 R3 +830b Copy 3:  23 x 29 cm. (Text 21 x 28 cm.). Another copy containing only the 26 numbered etched plates before letters. Bound in boards with original paper covers pasted on sides.

BEIN Speck Ck99 R3 +830b Copy 4: Another copy containing only the 26 numbered etched plates before letters. 23 x 30 cm. (Text 20 x 28 cm.) "THe chess-players. A drawing by Moritz Retzsch, explained, according to hints from himself, by C. Borr. von Miltitz," dated 1837: 1 leaf, 4 p. at end.
